#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>
#include <iomanip>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int amt,a,b,c,d;
    cin>>amt;
    a= amt/5;
    amt= amt%5;
    b= amt/3;
    amt= amt%3;
    c= amt/2;
    d= amt%2;
    cout<<a<<endl;
    cout<<b<<endl;
    cout<<c<<endl;
    cout<<d<<endl;
//    fflush(stdin);
//    system("PAUSE");
     return 0;
}
